value:
$WmMPID_双界ティアモ,ch04_17_Tiamo_FF_Pair,Face|Phew! Nicely done. That's half of all
the gifts we've handed out, now.$k$p$nMPID_ルーナ|That was only half?! Ugh...$k$pAren't festivals supposed to be fun?
Why are we the ones stuck doing all
the work?$k$p$nMPID_双界ティアモ|Winter envoy is an esteemed and
essential role. Delivering gifts is an
important part of the job.$k$p$nMPID_ルーナ|Sounds like a great way to dupe
someone into doing all the work
for you.$k$pListen, Mo—Cordelia. I think you're
letting people take advantage of
your generosity.$k$p$nMPID_双界ティアモ|What? No, that's not possible. If that
were true, I would have refused to do
it in the first place.$k$pOf course, I've never actually refused
anyone. It would be awfully rude to...
OK, I'm beginning to see your point.$k$p$nMPID_ルーナ|See?! You don't know how to say no!
And you're so perfect that you're just
used to everyone leaning on you!$k$p$nMPID_双界ティアモ|I suppose I do struggle a bit with that.
And with asking for help when I
need it.$k$p$nMPID_ルーナ|Leave it to me. I know exactly how to
help you break those habits.$k$pIt just so happens I know a thing or
two about tricking some poor sap
into doing everything for me.$k$pSo, no more deliveries. All you need
to do is sit back, relax, and watch
me wrap someone around my finger!$k$p$nMPID_双界ティアモ|Wait, what? Are you sure about this?!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ルーナ,ch04_17_Tiamo_FF_Pair,Face|Now let's see, who looks good for
hauling gifts... How about that guy in
the heavy armor? He looks perfect!$k$p$nMPID_双界ティアモ|So first you identify a...target?
Then what?$k$p$nMPID_ルーナ|Stumble into them and act helpless!$k$pNobody can resist the urge to flex
their muscles to impress a cute little
weakling in distress. You'll see.$k$pOK, here we go. Watch and learn!$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_DAMAGE0|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|Ow! Damn, that actually hurt—I mean,
owwie! I'm so sorry, mister! Oh no,
I dropped all these gifts...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭漆黒の騎士,ch09_08_BlackNight_M_Winter22,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Winter22,Face|An ambush? What is the meaning
of this?$k$p$WmMPID_ルーナ,ch04_17_Tiamo_FF_Pair,Face|Uh, what?! No, I... Hey, this isn't how
it's supposed to go! What's wrong
with you two?!$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ルーナ,ch04_17_Tiamo_FF_Pair,Face|I'm sorry, all right? I didn't mean to
bump into you! It's just...these gifts,
they're all so heavy...$k$pMy poor arms just can't lift them
anymore. I'm too weak! Oh, woe
is me! What am I to do?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭漆黒の騎士,ch09_08_BlackNight_M_Winter22,Face|See that it does not happen again.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_Winter22,Face|The more you complain, the less
energy you will have to complete
your task. Redouble your efforts.$k$p$WmMPID_ルーナ,ch04_17_Tiamo_FF_Pair,Face|Now hold on a—ugh, I can't believe
they just walked off like that. Not a
shred of decency between them!$k$p$nMPID_双界ティアモ|On the contrary, they were decent
enough to forgive you for so rudely
bumping into them.$k$p$nMPID_ルーナ|Hey, whose side are you on?!
Ugh, typical...$k$p$Sbs150|
